thread.title: Government raises £591m selling off final Royal Mail shareholding
thread.title_full: Government raises £591m selling off final Royal Mail shareholding

author: John Ficenec
title: Government raises £591m selling off final Royal Mail shareholding
text: Government raises £591m selling off final Royal Mail shareholding Department for Business, Innovation and Skills authorises sale of 13pc shareholding and gifts 1pc to employees Royal Mail was privatised in October 2013 Photo: Getty Images By John Ficenec , and Jon Yeomans 8:08AM BST 13 Oct 2015
